汎用_ウィンド情報アプリ

texts: The repeater was the last thing Nonno needed to complete the drone modification, so she joined the search too.
It was 10:17am—the plane had about 15 minutes of fuel left.

options.chara: 汎用_ウィンド情報アプリ

texts: We really were running out of time.

options.chara: 汎用_ウィンド情報アプリ

texts: We've looked through everything here, so why...?

options.chara: 汎用_ウィンド情報アプリ

texts: Momo had searched every inch of the storage room all by herself, but she didn't have anything to show for it, and was starting to panic.

options.chara: 汎用_ウィンド情報アプリ

texts: Nonno, can I clean up the things on the floor?
Uhh... Sure you can, but will that actually help...?
I don't know. But perhaps we'll find the repeater once we take care of this mess?
Momo began picking up things up from the floor and putting them into the baskets on the shelves. I went over to help out.
She froze. She was looking down at a trapdoor that had just been uncovered.
As she opened it up, the air filled with dust and the smell of mold. I couldn't help coughing a little.
Momo dipped her torso straight through the hatch though, and carefully looked around.
I think it might have fallen through the gap.
Momo climbed back up, wiped the dust off the repeater, and handed it to Nonno.
Now we had everything we needed. All we had to do was put it together.
We brought Nonno the parts she asked for, held parts in place for her, and generally helped out as we waited.

scenes.label: *visibility

options.chara: 汎用_ウィンド情報アプリ
汎用_ウィンド情報アプリ
汎用_ウィンド情報アプリ

texts: Cross shared his vision with me.
I saw an old, Showa-style apartment with "Swallow Apartments" written by the entrance.
There were hacker-like people wearing expensive carrianodes out front. Police were holding them back as they tried to get in.
It doesn't look like you'll get in.
That was when the first door on the second floor—probably to Room 201—opened up.
And the ones who came out were...
All three gathered outside the door.

options.chara: 汎用_ウィンド情報アプリ

texts: But Lime Nukui was nowhere in sight.

options.chara: 汎用_ウィンド情報アプリ
汎用_ウィンド情報アプリ

texts: I couldn't hear them, but they looked dissatisfied.

options.chara: 汎用_ウィンド情報アプリ

texts: I'm gonna look into this and see if I can't tease out some information. I'll get you that flight path soon.
